MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the PA16 postcode area of Greenock. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7pm to repair an underground cable fault and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:42pm on 30th October 2020.
